pageContext.claim: “If @MittRomney spent the same energy fighting Barack Obama as he does fighting Donald Trump, he could have won the race (maybe)!”
pageContext.analysis: Trumped tweeted this over a video poking fun at Sen. Mitt Romney (R-Utah), apparently because Romney criticized the behavior by Trump and his aides depicted in the special counsel's report. But it's a dubious assertion. Romney, unlike Trump, was running against an incumbent president, making it a more difficult run. Russia also did not try to meddle in the 2008 election.
